channel.title: Adding snow so it snows forever?

item.title: Adding snow so it snows forever?
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Okay well, I’ve recently added the snow frame or interface to my server and I made it so when a player logs in it automatically activates the snow interface. Well, about a second after being logged in the snow interface stops working and its back to normal. Whatever I try I can’t seem to get it to work. I’m asking for the real snow code, NOT the command. I don’t want the ::snow or ::nosnow command I just want something like the code below:

//////////////////////////////////////////////////
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(11877);
//////////////////////////////////////////////////

Thats the code I’m using and for some reason its not working right. Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Adding snow so it snows forever?
